titlePage.intro: This is my personal website where you can learn more about my experiences and skills.

aboutMe.heading: About Me
aboutMe.description:
My name is Micha Batelaan, and I am an enthusiastic Software Engineering student at the Amsterdam University of Applied Sciences.
With a passion for technology and problem-solving, I work on developing innovative software solutions.
I am eager to learn, driven, and always looking for ways to further expand my knowledge in IT.
Besides my studies, I enjoy taking on new challenges, such as with my hobbies of cooking, gardening, and making music.
I play the guitar, but I prefer listening to music over playing it myself.
I love to show my best in everything I do.
I excel at finding solutions to problems, thanks to my love for puzzles and my experience with IT service-related studies and internships.
Additionally, you will hopefully find me at the Friday afternoon drinks.
I enjoy a friendly atmosphere at work, and I am definitely not afraid to ask questions or help where needed.

This site is built with VUE.js

personal_skills.name: Communication
personal_skills.description: Effectively conveying ideas and information in both written and verbal forms.

personal_skills.name: Teamwork
personal_skills.description: Collaborating and contributing within diverse groups to achieve common goals.

personal_skills.name: Problem-Solving
personal_skills.description: Analysing problems, identifying solutions, and implementing effective strategies.

personal_skills.name: Adaptability
personal_skills.description: Flexibility to adapt to changing situations and quickly learn new skills.

personal_skills.name: Time Management
personal_skills.description: Efficiently organising and prioritising tasks to meet deadlines.

technical_skills.name: Programming
technical_skills.description: Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, JavaScript, Java, and C#.

technical_skills.name: Data Analysis
technical_skills.description: Expertise in analysing and visualising data using tools like Excel, SQL, or PowerBI.

technical_skills.name: Web Development
technical_skills.description: Experience in building and maintaining websites using HTML, CSS, and frameworks like Vue and React.

technical_skills.name: Cloud Computing
technical_skills.description: Knowledge of cloud platforms like Azure or Google Cloud.

technical_skills.name: DevOps
technical_skills.description: Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and tools like Docker.

technical_skills.name: Scrum
technical_skills.description: Knowledge of Agile software development methods like SCRUM.
